option.name: My manager
option.description: The customer who benefits from this service is your manager.

option.name: My self
option.description: Your primary customer of this service is yourself

option.name: My team
option.description: Your customer benefiting from service is your team.

option.name: Peers
option.description: Your customer is a peer.

option.name: Leaders
option.description: Your customer is leaders across the company

option.name: Executive Staff
option.description: Your customer for this service is the executive staff (direct reports to CEO)

option.name: Functional Group
option.description: Your customer for is a functional group that requires the service.

option.name: Company
option.description: Your customer for this service is the whole company (or at least a number of groups within the company).

option.name: General Employees
option.description: Your customer for this are employees.

option.name: External Customer
option.description: Your customer for this service is a customer of the company.

option.name: Partner
option.description: Your customer is a third party partner.

option.name: Other
option.description: Your customer for this service is someone other than the options provided.

option.name: Revenue Gen
option.description: Directly impacts revenue generation

option.name: Profitability
option.description: Directly impacts the profit of the company (saves cost, reduces waste, streamlines, makes org more efficient)

option.name: Customer Sat
option.description: Directly impacts customer satisfaction

option.name: Employee Sat
option.description: Directly impacts employee satisfaction

option.name: Risk Management
option.description: Directly impacts risk reduction for the company

option.name: Other
option.description: Other impact

option.name: Core
option.description: Requires a basic to modest level of training and/or experience to adequately deliver service

option.name: Skilled
option.description: Requires skilled problem-solving based on years of relevant knowledge or experience to adequately deliver service

option.name: Expert
option.description: Requires expert-level talent with hard-to-replace analytical, contextual or strategic experience

option.name: The service is working well
option.description: This service does not need improving

option.name: The service needs improving
option.description: This service does need improving

option.name: Environmental / team dynamics impacting service effectiveness
option.description: There is something going on in the environment or within the team that is having a negative impact on the quality/effectiveness of the service (e.g. toxic environment, exclusion/lack of belonging, poor leadership....)

option.name: Improvement is in process
option.description: A project is underway to improve this service

option.name: I want to lead improving this service
option.description: I want to lead or participate in improving this service

option.name: This service could be automated / autsourced
option.description: Some or all of this service could be automated/outsourced

option.name: Service not needed / not adding value
option.description: This service is not needed; can be eliminated

option.name: I am fully capable and confident
option.description: I am confident and capable in performing this service

option.name: This service offers me an opportunity to grow
option.description: I am learning and growing from this service

option.name: This is a stretch for me; need additional support
option.description: I want to improve my ability to perform this service and need additional support

option.name: My talent is NOT aligned with this service
option.description: My skills or strengths aren't aligned to perform this service

option.name: There is another person I know, which is better suited
option.description: I may or not be capable of doing this service, but there is someone who would be better (either because they really want to do it or just have the talent)

option.name: Enjoy this service; would like to keep doing it
option.description: I enjoy this service; would like to keep doing it

option.name: Enjoy this service; would like to do more of it
option.description: I enjoy this service; would like to do more of it

option.name: Dislike this service; would prefer not to do it
option.description: Dislike this service; would prefer not to do it

option.name: Been there done that; I am not learning or growing
option.description: Been there done that; I am not learning or growing

option.name: Would like to train / mentor others to do this service
option.description: I would like to train/mentor others to do this service

option.name: Specific project that is completed / no longer needed
option.description: This was work or a service that no longer needs to be done; only needed to be completed once

option.name: Not doing this, but would like to in the future
option.description: I am not doing this, but would like to in the future
